title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Sep 6 2022

description:
Climate Crisis? How About the Energy Crisis? Andy McCarthy on the Legal Trench Warfare Against Trump. Why the Eliza Fletcher Abduction and Murder Hits Home. Mollie Hemingway on How Republicans Can Do Better.
